#Library
```{r}
library(psych)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```


#Import Data
```{r}
bodyt <- read.csv(file = "C:/Users/Lenovo/Downloads/BodyTempSample.csv", header = TRUE)
```

#Convert list to numeric vector
```{r}
bodyt1 <- as.numeric(unlist(bodyt))
```

#Summary Statistics
```{r}
summary(bodyt1)

IQR(bodyt1)

range(bodyt1, na.rm =TRUE)

sd(bodyt1, na.rm = TRUE)
```


#Bodytemp Graph
```{r}
hist(x=bodyt$BodyTemp,
     main = "Body Temp Sample",
     xlab = "Body Temp",
     ylab = "Frequency")
```

#SEM Calculation
```{r}
mean_se
```

#t-value
```{r}
pt(bodyt$BodyTemp, df = 49)
```
